R

randomSuccess(Random, double) - Static method in class asgn2Simulators.Simulator
Static utility method to implement a Bernoulli Trial, a coin toss with two outcomes: success (probability successProb) and failure (probability 1-successProb)
rebookCancelledPassengers(int) - Method in class asgn2Simulators.Simulator
Method to explore rebooking of cancelled passengers up to Constants.CANCELLATION_PERIOD days after their intended departureTime.
refuseBooking(Passenger, int) - Method in class asgn2Simulators.Simulator
Method to add a Passenger to the refused list.
refused - Variable in class asgn2Passengers.Passenger
 
refusePassenger(int) - Method in class asgn2Passengers.Passenger
Transition passenger to Refused
PRE: isNew(this) OR isQueued(this)
POST: isRefused(this) refusePassenger:New -> Refused refusePassenger:Queued -> Refused; finalised on departureTime if isQueued(this), then POST: this.getExitQueueTime() == refusalTime
resetStatus(int) - Method in class asgn2Simulators.Simulator
Simple helper method to rest the status message - called each simulation step
run() - Method in class asgn2Simulators.GUISimulator
 
runSimulation() - Method in class asgn2Simulators.SimulationRunner
Method to run the simulation from start to finish.
